constituent: prudence, tiger, think, rice field, brains, heart
koohiiStory1: Real meaning: "to ponder". You have to think with prudence (ponder carefully) about approaching a tiger, as is evident from 虎.
koohiiStory2: You have to think with prudence about approaching a tiger. If not, it will eat your brains and heart. Thanks raulir.
kunYomi: おもんぱく.る、おもんぱか.る
